enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must complete Psych 205-0 before taking this course.
title: WCAS PSYCH 335-0-20 Decision Making
class_attributes:
Social & Behavioral Sciences Distro Area

Attendance at 1st class mandatory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will focus on human decision making from both descriptive and prescriptive perspectives. Theories and models of decision making will be evaluated and applied to a variety of contexts. Topics to be discussed include how people consider alternatives, make predictions and estimations, and evaluate possibilities.

subject: PSYCH
